trans-unit.source: A negative number indicates that this is smaller than the object being compared to. A positive number indicates that this is larger than the compared to object and a Zero means that the objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 负数表明这是不是被比较的对象小。正数表示此对象大于与对象比较的对象，零则表示对象相等。

trans-unit.target: 这些都是等价的形式。

trans-unit.source: Best easy way with JAVA 8 is for English Alphabetic sort
trans-unit.target: 使用JAVA 8的最佳方法是按英文字母顺序排序

trans-unit.source: Both of these interfaces allow for different behavior. Comparable allows you to make the object act like you just described Strings (in fact, String implements Comparable). The second, Comparator, allows you to do what you are asking to do. You would do it like this:
trans-unit.target: 这两个接口都允许不同的行为。Comparable允许你使对象的行为像你刚才描述的Strings一样(事实上,String实现了Comparable)。第二种,Comparator,允许你做你要求做的事情。你会这样做。

trans-unit.source: Classes that has a natural sort order (a class Number, as an example) should implement the Comparable interface, whilst classes that has no natural sort order (a class Chair, as an example) should be provided with a Comparator (or an anonymous Comparator class).
trans-unit.target: 具有自然排序顺序的类(例如 Number 类)应该实现 Comparable 接口,而没有自然排序顺序的类(例如 Chair 类)应该提供一个 Comparator(或匿名的 Comparator 类)。

trans-unit.source: For Java 8:
trans-unit.target: 对于Java 8来说。

trans-unit.target: 为了对 ArrayList 进行排序，您可以使用以下代码片段：

trans-unit.target: 从 Java 8 开始，我们不必直接使用 Collections.sort() 。 List 接口具有默认的 sort() 方法：

trans-unit.source: I found most if not all of these answers rely on the underlying class (Object) to implement comparable or to have a helper comparable interface.
trans-unit.target: 我发现大部分(如果不是全部的话)这些答案都依赖于底层的类(对象)来实现可比性,或者是有一个帮助者可比性的接口。

trans-unit.source: I prefer this process:
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢这个过程。

trans-unit.source: I read about sorting ArrayLists using a Comparator but in all of the examples people used compareTo which according to some research is a method for Strings.
trans-unit.target: 我读过有关使用Comparator对ArrayList进行排序的信息，但在所有示例中，人们都使用了 compareTo ，根据一些研究，它是String的一种方法。

trans-unit.source: I wanted to sort an ArrayList of custom objects by one of their properties: a Date object (getStartDay()). Normally I compare them by item1.getStartDate().before(item2.getStartDate()) so I was wondering whether I could write something like:
trans-unit.target: 我想按自定义对象的属性之一对ArrayList进行排序：Date对象（ getStartDay() ）。通常我通过 item1.getStartDate().before(item2.getStartDate()) 所以我想知道是否可以编写类似以下内容的内容：

trans-unit.source: If you are into java8, you find a lot of material there to get you started.
trans-unit.target: 如果你对java8有兴趣,你可以在那里找到很多资料来帮助你入门。

trans-unit.source: If you list of objects has a property called startDate, you call use this over and over. You can even chain them startDate.time.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象列表具有名为 startDate 的属性，则反复调用它。您甚至可以将它们链接为 startDate.time 。

trans-unit.source: If you notice here I'm creating a anonymous inner class ( which is the Java for closures ) and passing it directly to the sort method of the class Arrays
trans-unit.target: 如果您在这里注意到，我正在创建一个匿名内部类（闭包的Java）并将其直接传递给 Arrays 类的 sort 方法。

trans-unit.source: Java 8 Lambda shortens the sort.
trans-unit.target: Java 8 Lambda缩短了排序。

trans-unit.source: New since 1.8 is a List.sort() method instead of using the Collection.sort() so you directly call mylistcontainer.sort()
trans-unit.target: 从1.8开始新增了List.sort()方法,而不是使用Collection.sort(),所以你可以直接调用mylistcontainer.sort()

trans-unit.source: Not with my solution! The following code lets you compare object's field by knowing their string name. You could easily modify it not to use the name, but then you need to expose it or construct one of the Objects you want to compare against.

trans-unit.source: Since Date implements Comparable, it has a compareTo method just like String does.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Date 实现 Comparable ，因此它具有 String 一样的 compareTo 方法。

trans-unit.target: 自从Java-8

trans-unit.source: Sort ArrayList of custom Objects by property
trans-unit.target: 按属性对自定义对象的ArrayList进行排序

trans-unit.source: That will cause the Collections.sort method to use your comparator for it's sorting mechanism. If the objects in the ArrayList implement comparable, you can instead do something like this:
trans-unit.target: 这将导致 Collections.sort 方法使用你的比较器作为排序机制。如果ArrayList中的对象实现了可比性,你可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: The Collections class contains a number of these useful, common tools.
trans-unit.target: 该集合类包含了一些这些有用的，常用工具。

trans-unit.source: The Collections.sort method can sort a List using a Comparator you pass. That Comparator can be implemented using the Comparator.comparing method where you can pass a method reference as the necessary Function. Fortunately, the actual code is much simpler and shorter than this description.
trans-unit.target: 该 Collections.sort 方法排序 List 使用 Comparator 你通过。该 Comparator 可以使用来实现 Comparator.comparing 方法，其中可以传递一个方法参考作为必要 Function 。幸运的是，实际代码比此描述要简单得多且短得多。

trans-unit.source: The compare() method must return an int, so you couldn't directly return a boolean like you were planning to anyway.
trans-unit.target: 的 compare() 方法必须返回一个 int ，所以你不能直接返回一个 boolean 像你打算反正。

trans-unit.source: The Fruit class is:
trans-unit.target: 果类是。

trans-unit.source: The drawback is, that this comparator silently ignores properties which does not exist or are not accessible and handles this as null value for comparison. This means, you should carefully test such a comparator or validate the existence of the property path somehow.
trans-unit.target: 缺点是，该比较器无声地忽略了不存在或不可访问的属性，并将其作为空值进行比较。这意味着，您应该仔细测试这样的比较器或以某种方式验证属性路径的存在。

trans-unit.source: This code snippets might be useful. If you want to sort an Object in my case I want to sort by VolumeName:
trans-unit.target: 这个代码片段可能会有用。如果你想对一个对象进行排序,在我的例子中,我想用VolumeName来排序。

trans-unit.source: This is such a common idiom that there's a built-in method to generate a Comparator for a class with a Comparable key:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常常见的习惯用法，因此有一个内置方法可以为具有 Comparable 键的类生成 Comparator ：

trans-unit.source: This requires your object to be Comparable which means you need a compareTo, equals, and hashCode implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这要求您的对象是可 Comparable ，这意味着您需要一个 compareTo ， equals 和 hashCode 实现。

trans-unit.source: This works. I use it in my jsp.
trans-unit.target: 这个很好用。我在我的jsp中使用它。

trans-unit.source: Using Java 8 use can define the Comparator in one line using Comparator.comparing()
trans-unit.target: 使用Java 8可以使用 Comparator.comparing() 在一行中定义 Comparator 。

trans-unit.source: With Java 8 you can use a method reference for your comparator:
trans-unit.target: 在Java 8中,你可以为你的比较器使用方法引用。

trans-unit.source: With this library here you can sort the list of custom objects on multiple columns. The library uses version 8.0 features. Sample is also available there. Here is a sample to do
trans-unit.target: 使用此库，您可以在多列上对自定义对象的列表进行排序。该库使用8.0版功能。那里也有样品。这是一个样本

trans-unit.source: Yes, it could be faster... But now you don't have to make a new Comparator for each type of sort. If you can save on dev time and give up on runtime, you might go with this one.
trans-unit.target: 是的,它可以更快.....但现在你不用为每一种类型的排序做一个新的比较器了。如果你能节省开发时间并放弃运行时间,你可能会选择这个。

trans-unit.source: Yes, that's possible for instance in this answer I sort by the property v of the class IndexValue
trans-unit.target: 是的，这是可能的，例如在此答案中，我按类 IndexValue 的属性 v 进行了排序

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can. There are two options with comparing items, the Comparable interface, and the Comparator interface.
trans-unit.target: 是的你可以。比较项目有两个选项，可比较界面和比较器界面。

trans-unit.source: You can check this article if you would like to read more about the Comparable interface (disclosure: I am the author ;) ) https://nullbeans.com/the-java-comparable-interface-automatic-sort-of-collections/
trans-unit.target: 如果您想了解有关Comparable接口的更多信息，可以查看本文（披露：我是作者;）） https://nullbeans.com/the-java-comparable-interface-automatic-sort-of-collections/

trans-unit.source: You can have a look into this presentation hold at the Java Forum in Stuttgart Germany in 2016.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在2016年德国斯图加特的Java论坛上观看此演示文稿。

trans-unit.source: You can now write the last example in a shorter form by using a lambda expression for the Comparator:
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以通过对 Comparator 使用lambda表达式，以较短的形式编写最后一个示例：

trans-unit.source: You can then use the collections.sort(myList) to sort your list without having to feed in a comparator. This method also has the advantage of having things sorted automatically if you use a sorted collection data structures like a TreeSet or a TreeMap.
trans-unit.target: 然后你可以使用collections.sort(myList)来对你的列表进行排序,而不需要输入比较器。如果你使用排序的集合数据结构(如TreeSet或TreeMap),这个方法还有一个好处,就是可以自动排序。

trans-unit.target: 您可以尝试番石榴订购：

trans-unit.source: You can try solving these tasks with LambdaJ. You can find it here: http://code.google.com/p/lambdaj/
trans-unit.target: 您可以尝试使用LambdaJ解决这些任务。您可以在这里找到它：http : //code.google.com/p/lambdaj/

trans-unit.source: You can use the Bean Comparator to sort on any property in your custom class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用Bean比较器对自定义类中的任何属性进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You could also use Springs PropertyComparator if you have just a String property path to the (nested) property you want to sort:
trans-unit.target: 如果只有要排序的（嵌套）属性的String属性路径，则也可以使用Springs PropertyComparator：

trans-unit.source: Your custom class can implement the "Comparable" interface, which requires an implementation of the CompareTo method. In the CompareTo method, you can then define what it means that an object is less than or more than the other object. So in your example, it can look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 您的自定义类可以实现“ Comparable”接口，该接口需要执行CompareTo方法。然后，在CompareTo方法中，可以定义一个对象小于或大于另一个对象的含义。因此，在您的示例中，它看起来可能像这样：

trans-unit.source: Your object may also implement Comparable ( that's what String and most of the core libraries in Java does ) but that would define the "natural sort order" of the class it self, and doesn't let you plug new ones.
trans-unit.target: 您的对象也可以实现 Comparable （这是String和Java中大多数核心库所做的工作），但是它将定义它自己的类的“自然排序顺序”，并且不允许您插入新的。

trans-unit.source: Your sorting code would be just about like you wrote:
trans-unit.target: 你的排序代码就像你写的那样。

trans-unit.source: compare() must answer the question: Is object 1 less than, equal to or greater than object 2?
trans-unit.target: compare()必须回答这个问题。对象1是小于、等于还是大于对象2?

trans-unit.source: full docs: http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/util/Comparator.html
trans-unit.target: 完整的文档：http : //java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/util/Comparator.html

trans-unit.target: 使用java-8流api可以按以下方式对 ArrayList 进行排序：

trans-unit.source: where OurCustomComparator is using default methods (and other interesting ideas). As shown, leading to very concise code to pick some getter method for sorting; and super simple chaining (or reversing) of sort criteria.
trans-unit.target: 其中 OurCustomComparator 使用的是默认的方法（和其他有趣的想法）。如图所示，导致非常简洁的代码选择一些getter方法进行排序；以及排序标准的超简单链接（或反向）。

trans-unit.source: your customComparator class must implement java.util.Comparator in order to be used. it must also overide compare() AND equals()
trans-unit.target: 你的 customComparator 类必须实现 java.utilator.Comparator 才能被使用。
